title: Neko de Ningyo wo Tsuru Hanashi
sinopse:
Watanuki Masanao is the best doctor at Inokashira Hospital, but also the least popular due to his menacing appearance and aloof demeanor towards his patients. Things begin to change when a woman without much time left to live comes under his care.

[Written by Denji]

Included one-shots:
Volume 3: Neko Natsu, Night Cruise
